# Loading necessities
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggtext)
library(naniar)
library(broom)
```

# Loading in dataset
```{r}
data <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2022/2022-10-04/product_hunt.csv")
```

# get a grasp on the dataset
```{r}
colnames(data)

head(data, 5)
tibble(data)
```
